xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="class-mappings">${class mappings}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <hp-service-center-response> <xsl:copy-of select="node()/*" /> <mappings> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($class-mappings)/*/*" /> </mappings> </hp-service-center-response> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:for-each select="//item/parameters/model/instance"> <Configuration-Item> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::device" /> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::computer" /> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::instance" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="." /> </Configuration-Item> </xsl:for-each> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="device"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="computer"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element/*"> <xsl:variable name="array-element-name" select="local-name()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with <instance>'s current child name, the location attribute's value of this <mapping>'s child element is 'computer' and substring-after(text of this <mapping>'s child element, concat($instance-element-child-name, '-')) is equal to the local-name of the array element --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and @location='computer' and $array-element-name=substring-after(text(), concat($instance-element-child-name, '-'))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="instance"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="class-mappings">${class mappings}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <hp-service-center-response> <xsl:copy-of select="node()/*" /> <mappings> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($class-mappings)/*/*" /> </mappings> </hp-service-center-response> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:for-each select="//item/parameters/model/instance"> <Configuration-Item> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::instance" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="." /> </Configuration-Item> </xsl:for-each> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="instance"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="class-mappings">${class mappings}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <hp-service-center-response> <xsl:copy-of select="node()/*" /> <mappings> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($class-mappings)/*/*" /> </mappings> </hp-service-center-response> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:for-each select="//item/parameters/model/instance"> <Configuration-Item> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::device" /> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::network-device" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="." /> </Configuration-Item> </xsl:for-each> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="device"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="network-device"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="instance"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow formats fields, and values into a given output document structure identified by class name.
